attributes.action: Total unequivocal ban on fanatical religious groups originating from Islamic countries.
attributes.additional_details:
As the British public we call upon the government and the Ministry of defence to make it illegal for anyone to take part or be part of any fanatical religious groups who's sole purpose is to breakdown the stability of this country.

It is a real and present danger with possible sleeper cells infiltrating Great Britain and feel the present government are over looking the threat to national security from these fanatical groups.

Whilst this country accepts people from all religious backgrounds we must maintain a clear example that this is a Christian country and our laws and beliefs will be protected to maintain its stability.

We call upon the government to make it clear that such practices will not be tolerated and will use the full force of English law to protect this country and its people from any form of attack from its home land or abroad.
